Sri Mulyani Mulai Investigasi 'Desa Hantu' Penyedot Dana Desa
07 Nov 2019, 08:13 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Denny Putra/Infografis

Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati tengah menginvestigasi kebenaran adanya desa tak berpenduduk alias fiktif yang mendapatkan aliran uang dari program dana desa.Hal itu diungkapkan Dirjen Anggaran Kementerian Keuangan, Askolani di Kemenko Bidang Perekonomian, Jakarta Pusat.Askolani mengatakan, Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati sedang mengkaji data di Ditjen Perimbangan Keuangan yang menjadi pengawas program dana desa."Lagi diminta ibu review ke dirjen perimbangan keuangan," kata Askolani, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Hasil kajian tersebut, kata Askolani akan menjadi pegangan Kementerian Keuangan dalam menentukan kebijakan program dana desa ke depannya."Sudah ada tapi mungkin mereka akan koordinasikan. Untuk jadi bahan kebijakan ke depan untuk perbaikan," ungkap dia. Simak Video "Sri Mulyani Temukan 'Desa Hantu', Anggota Komisi XI: Jangan Terkejut"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/ang)

Sri Mulyani Begins Investigation of 'Village Ghost' Village Fund Suction
Nov 7 2019, 08:13 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Denny Putra / Infographics

Jakarta - Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati is investigating the truth of the existence of a non-populated alias fictitious village that gets money from the village fund program. currently reviewing data at the Directorate General of Fiscal Balance which is the supervisor of the village fund program. "I was asked by the mother to review the Director General of Fiscal Balance," Askolani said, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). in determining the future village fund program policies. "There are already but maybe they will coordinate. To be the policy material in the future for improvement," he said.
